snippet: The president hasn’t explained what “limited” military action would mean in Syria.
abstract: Editorial calls on Pres Obama to clarify limits of his proposed intervention in Syria during live address to nation; warns administration is already showing signs of mission creep by expanding target list; condemns G-20 nations that failed to issue joint condemnation of use of chemical weapons by Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: The president hasn’t explained what “limited” military action would mean in Syria.

headline.main: Can Mr. Obama Avoid Mission Creep?
headline.print_headline: Can Mr. Obama Avoid Mission Creep?
